body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Gerald Moore and the customer's name is Amy Parker.  The conversation is about a random business (a Photography Studio ) and is a conversation about billing.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, my name is Gerald Moore, and I am with SnapShots Photography Studio. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi Gerald! I have some questions about my recent billing statement.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Of course, Amy! I’d be happy to help you with that. Could I get your last name to pull up your account?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Amy Parker. For verification purposes, can you please provide me with your email address?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great! Now could you also give me the last four digits of your phone number?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: That would be one two three four.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for that information, Amy. I have your account open now. What specific questions do you have about your billing statement?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I noticed an extra charge that I don't understand.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Let me take a look at that charge for you. Thank you for your patience, I appreciate it.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: It seems it was for an additional photo editing service. Does that clarify things for you?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Yes, that makes sense! Thank you, Gerald.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Amy! Thank you for your time today, and if you have any more questions in the future, feel free to reach out. Have a great day!
